org.forgerock.openidm.smartevent.core

Interface StatisticsHandlerMBean

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StatisticsHandler

    public interface StatisticsHandlerMBean
    This MBean interface is expected to change!!! Provide JMX / MBean access for monitoring and management of SmartEvents and in turn the instrumented application

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,Boolean> getEventsEnabledMap() 
      Map getRecent() 
      Map<String,Boolean> getResultHistoryEnabledMap() 
      Map getTotals() 
      void resetAllStatistics()
      Reset all statistics data for events
      void resetStatistics(String eventName)
      Reset statistics data for given event name
      void setEventsEnabled(String eventName, boolean enabled)
      Set the enabled status for a given event name Disabling an event means no consumer will get notified
      void setResultHistoryEnabled(String eventName, boolean enabled)
      Set the result history enabled status for a given event name

    • Method Detail

      • getTotals

        Map getTotals()
        Returns:
        The statistics totals

      • getRecent

        Map getRecent()
        Returns:
        the recent history of events, mapping from start time to the event detail

      • resetAllStatistics

        void resetAllStatistics()
        Reset all statistics data for events

      • resetStatistics

        void resetStatistics(String eventName)
        Reset statistics data for given event name
        Parameters:
        eventName - the event name in Stringified notation

      • setEventsEnabled

        void setEventsEnabled(String eventName,
                    boolean enabled)
        Set the enabled status for a given event name Disabling an event means no consumer will get notified
        Parameters:
        eventName - the event name in Stringified notation
        enabled - true to enable event processing, false to disable

      • getEventsEnabledMap

        Map<String,Boolean> getEventsEnabledMap()
        Returns:
        A map from Stringified event name to its enabled status

      • setResultHistoryEnabled

        void setResultHistoryEnabled(String eventName,
                           boolean enabled)
        Set the result history enabled status for a given event name
        Parameters:
        eventName - the event name in Stringified notation
        enabled - true to keep result details in the recent event history How long it is kept depends on the history size and the frequency of new events Caution should be exercised on events with large result objects as it will affect system memory consumption

      • getResultHistoryEnabledMap

        Map<String,Boolean> getResultHistoryEnabledMap()
        Returns:
        A map from Stringified event name to its result history enabled status
